includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: A CIA agent learns that a US soldier has been turned by al-Qaeda, just as a prisoner of war returns after eight years.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A CIA agent learns that a US soldier has been turned by al-Qaeda, just as a prisoner of war returns after eight years.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A CIA agent learns that a US soldier has been turned by al-Qaeda, just as a prisoner of war returns after eight years.

includedAssets.title: Grace
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie watches Brody's every movement, except for when he enters the one blind spot: his garage. An undercover agent makes a crucial sighting.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carrie watches Brody's every movement, except for when he enters the one blind spot: his garage. An undercover agent makes a crucial sighting.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carrie watches Brody's every movement, except for when he enters the one blind spot: his garage. An undercover agent makes a crucial sighting.

includedAssets.title: Clean Skin
includedAssets.synopsis: The Brodies agree to an interview about their perfect family life, despite Dana's objections. Carrie continues to lie to Lynne.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Brodies agree to an interview about their perfect family life, despite Dana's objections. Carrie continues to lie to Lynne.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Brodies agree to an interview about their perfect family life, despite Dana's objections. Carrie continues to lie to Lynne.

includedAssets.title: Semper I
includedAssets.synopsis: Political forces make big plans for Brody, but his actions threaten his media image. Carrie tries to find a financial link between Nazir and Brody.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Political forces make big plans for Brody, but his actions threaten his media image. Carrie tries to find a financial link between Nazir and Brody.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Political forces make big plans for Brody, but his actions threaten his media image. Carrie tries to find a financial link between Nazir and Brody.

includedAssets.title: Blind Spot
includedAssets.synopsis: Brody persuades Estes to let him speak to his former guard, whom the CIA have captured. Carrie continues to alienate her allies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brody persuades Estes to let him speak to his former guard, whom the CIA have captured. Carrie continues to alienate her allies.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brody persuades Estes to let him speak to his former guard, whom the CIA have captured. Carrie continues to alienate her allies.

includedAssets.title: The Good Soldier
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie uses any means necessary to get closer to Brody. The CIA polygraph tests everyone who had contact with Afsal Hamid.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carrie uses any means necessary to get closer to Brody. The CIA polygraph tests everyone who had contact with Afsal Hamid.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carrie uses any means necessary to get closer to Brody. The CIA polygraph tests everyone who had contact with Afsal Hamid.

includedAssets.title: The Weekend
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie and Brody try to spend some quality time together while Saul makes a critical breakthrough in Mexico.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carrie and Brody try to spend some quality time together while Saul makes a critical breakthrough in Mexico.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carrie and Brody try to spend some quality time together while Saul makes a critical breakthrough in Mexico.
includedAssets.guidanceText: strong language, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Achilles Heel
includedAssets.synopsis: The CIA lay a trap for Walker, while Brody is shocked to learn that his old friend is still alive.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The CIA lay a trap for Walker, while Brody is shocked to learn that his old friend is still alive.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The CIA lay a trap for Walker, while Brody is shocked to learn that his old friend is still alive.

includedAssets.title: Crossfire
includedAssets.synopsis: Abu Nazir attempts to reaffirm Brody's commitment as Carrie deals with the fallout from the mosque shooting.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Abu Nazir attempts to reaffirm Brody's commitment as Carrie deals with the fallout from the mosque shooting.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Abu Nazir attempts to reaffirm Brody's commitment as Carrie deals with the fallout from the mosque shooting.

includedAssets.title: Representative Brody
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie and Saul move in on Walker's contact. Brody is approached to run for a seat in the House of Representatives.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carrie and Saul move in on Walker's contact. Brody is approached to run for a seat in the House of Representatives.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carrie and Saul move in on Walker's contact. Brody is approached to run for a seat in the House of Representatives.

includedAssets.title: The Vest
includedAssets.synopsis: Saul begins to see the logic in Carrie's theories. Brody travels to Gettysburg to retrieve a crucial item.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Saul begins to see the logic in Carrie's theories. Brody travels to Gettysburg to retrieve a crucial item.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saul begins to see the logic in Carrie's theories. Brody travels to Gettysburg to retrieve a crucial item.

includedAssets.title: Marine One
includedAssets.synopsis: Saul continues Carrie's investigation and unearths disturbing truths. Brody prepares for his trip to the State Department. Season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Saul continues Carrie's investigation and unearths disturbing truths. Brody prepares for his trip to the State Department. Season finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saul continues Carrie's investigation and unearths disturbing truths. Brody prepares for his trip to the State Department. Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Brody struggles to pick a side, while Carrie and the CIA work to use him to capture Abu Nazir. Second season of the critically acclaimed drama starring Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Mandy Patinkin and David Harewood.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brody struggles to pick a side, while Carrie and the CIA work to capture Abu Nazir. Critically acclaimed drama starring Claire Danes and Damian Lewis.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brody struggles to pick a side, while Carrie and the CIA work to use him to capture Abu Nazir. Second season of the critically acclaimed drama starring Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Mandy Patinkin and David Harewood.

includedIn.title: Homeland
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Counter-terrorist expert Carrie Mathison struggles to balance her brilliance with the challenges of bipolar disorder as she fights to protect the US.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Counter-terrorist expert Carrie Mathison struggles to balance her instinctual brilliance with the challenges of bipolar disorder as she fights to protect the US from attack.

title: Homeland Season 1
synopsis: CIA agent Carrie Mathison (Claire Danes) learns an unnamed U.S. soldier has been turned by al-Qaeda, just as prisoner of war Marine Sergeant Nicholas Brody (Damian Lewis) is released after eight years. Golden Globe-winning drama also starring Mandy Patinkin and David Harewood.
shortSynopsis: CIA agent Carrie Mathison (Claire Danes) learns a U.S. soldier has been turned, just as prisoner of war Nicholas Brody (Damian Lewis) is released.
mediumSynopsis: CIA agent Carrie Mathison (Claire Danes) learns an unnamed U.S. soldier has been turned by al-Qaeda, just as prisoner of war Marine Sergeant Nicholas Brody (Damian Lewis) is released after eight years. Golden Globe-winning drama also starring Mandy Patinkin and David Harewood.
guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence
